concept.title: Parallel Requests
concept.shortdesc: The HTTP Client processor sends multiple requests at a time. To preserve record order, the processor waits until all requests for the entire batch are completed before processing the next batch.

conbody.p: You can specify the maximum number of parallel requests. Default is 1. Increasing the number of parallel requests can improve performance but increases the load on the server. Network latency can also significantly impact the performance of this processor.
